name: Little Mermaid Princess
description:
Mermaids are the ones that fascinate most! Meet the Mermaid Princess, girls, and check her angelic features and magnetizing charm! Today she’s inviting you to discover her steps of glamor. Her facial makeover with its refreshing masks transform her from a pretty mermaid into a sparkling little princess! Her professional make up kit and stunning little wardrobe are also at your disposal today so you can feel free to pick your favorite items when creating her the stunning look for today! Enjoy this new makeover game, make her up, dress her up and transform her into the perfect Mermaid Princess that she is!

★★★Features★★★

★ Only in “Little Mermaid Dress Up”: Enjoy two interesting mode
- Classic mode: Dress baby up to be cute, sweet or style up to you. Tap and keep in 2 seconds, you can choose vary of backgrounds from gallery to suit outfit. You can pinch, zoom, rotate and move model and background and have the most beautiful photos.
- Time mode: Try your memory to make her look like the model to get the highest score
★ A lot of make-up styles.
★ Difference accessories: earrings, necklaces, and bracelets
★ Many cute hair styles
★ Pretty color clothes: outfits, dresses, T-shirts and shoes..
★ Take nice photos and share with people over Facebook, Twitter.. or save in gallery.
